basics.name: Marcos Klender Carrasco
basics.label: Software Engineer with +8 years of experience
basics.summary: My expertise includes web development, project architecture, consulting, and continuous staff training, complemented by experience as a Full Stack Developer and iOS app creator. Passionate about technology and innovation, I'm committed to frontend development focused on intuitive, accessible user experiences and meticulous attention to detail.

experience.summary: Experienced IT professional with a proven track record of managing technology infrastructure and supporting mission-critical operations. experience.name: iLinser
